item.title: Complexity
item.description: Software development can be frustratingly difficult at times, but I suspect not in ways that one not involved in the process would expect. This assumption of mine is based on how I view other subjects which I have some interest in, but am a complete novice or worse. With drawing the thing most on my mind is simply trying to get my hand to produce the lines that I want. Even when trying to produce a single line it never looks exactly as I want.
